snippet.textDisplay:
চিত্ত যেথা ভয় শূন্য, উচ্চ যেথা শির,
জ্ঞান যেথা মুক্ত , যেথা গৃহের প্রাচীর
আপন প্রাঙ্গণতলে দিবস শর্ব্বরী
বসুধারে রাখে নাই খণ্ড ক্ষুদ্র করি,

যেথা বাক্য হৃদয়ের উৎসমুখ হতে
উচ্ছ্বসিয়া উঠে , যেথা নির্বারিত স্রোতে
দেশে দেশে দিশে দিশে কর্মধারা ধায়
অজস্র সহস্রবিধ চরিতার্থতায়,

যেথা তুচ্ছ আচারের মরুবালু রাশি
বিচারের স্রোতঃ পথ ফেলে নাই গ্রাসি ,
পৌরুষেরে করেনি শতধা ; নিত্য যেথা
তুমি সর্ব্ব কর্ম্ম চিন্তা আনন্দের নেতা, —
নিজ হস্তে নির্দয় আঘাত করি , পিতঃ
ভারতের সেই স্বর্গে করো জাগরিত 

To all Non-Bengals - I am sorry, I can't help but feel pity for those who don't know this language. I really wish everyone could understand the meaning of this song. Its wonderful and deep. Its actually a poem written by Rabindranath Tagore, which was later composed to a song by him.

The name of the actual song is - "Prayer"

snippet.textDisplay:
stupid people who claims that Rahman has destroyed this Rabindra Sangeet, should go & kill themselves, because....
1) Its a world famous Poem by kobi guru, not a rabindrasangeet for God's sake & Rahman just composed this song taking the first verse of the original poem...
2) Being aTamilian he has put his best effort to pronounce correctly which is actually a very tough job to do as its not a conventional Bengali...

Lastly, i would like to say hats off to Rahman sir & his team for doing such a great Job. Proud of You.
snippet.textOriginal:
stupid people who claims that Rahman has destroyed this Rabindra Sangeet, should go & kill themselves, because....
1) Its a world famous Poem by kobi guru, not a rabindrasangeet for God's sake & Rahman just composed this song taking the first verse of the original poem...
2) Being aTamilian he has put his best effort to pronounce correctly which is actually a very tough job to do as its not a conventional Bengali...

Lastly, i would like to say hats off to Rahman sir & his team for doing such a great Job. Proud of You.
